title: Portrait, 1970–79
medium:
Medium: synthetic fiber
Technique: Jacquard woven. Plain weave (white) with floats of varying length of a continuous supplementary weft which acts also in complementary fashion with the white foundation weft. A supplementary warp is used to tie down long
description: Black and white portrait of Mao Zedong or Chairman Mao (1893 – 1976). Chinese inscription on bottom border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Portrait, 1970–79.Medium: synthetic fiber
Technique: Jacquard woven. Plain weave (white) with floats of varying length of a continuous supplementary weft which acts also in complementary fashion with the white foundation weft. A supplementary warp is used to tie down long . 1975-23-5.
